name: Raviel, Lord of Phantasms
text: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by Tributing 3 Fiend-Type monsters. Each time your opponent Normal Summons a monster(s), Special Summon 1 "Phantasm Token" (Fiend-Type/DARK/Level 1/ATK 1000/DEF 1000). This token cannot declare an attack. Once per turn, you can Tribute 1 monster to have this card gain ATK equal to the original ATK of the Tributed monster until the End Phase of this turn.
